Headline: Red Line Delays
ShortDescription: Red Line trains are running with residual delays and congestion following earlier signal problems at Howard. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Red Line trains are running with residual delays and congestion following earlier signal problems at Howard.

Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #152 Addison Temporary Reroute at Clark/Addison
ShortDescription: #152 Addison buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Addison, Racine, Belmont, Halsted, due to street blockage near Clark/Addison.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#152 Addison buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Addison, Racine, Belmont, Halsted, then resume their normal route on Addison, due to street blockage near Clark/Addison.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #52 Kedzie/California Temporary Northbound Reroute near Kedzie/Roosevelt
ShortDescription: Northbound 52 Kedzie/California buses are temporarily rerouted via Kedzie, Roosevelt, Homan, Harrison and Kedzie near Kedzie/Roosevelt.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How will this affect my trip?

 

Northbound #52 Kedzie/California buses are temporarily rerouted via Kedzie, Roosevelt, Homan, Harrison, Kedzie and over regular route, due to street blockage near Kedzie/Roosevelt.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #94 California Temporary Southbound Reroute near California/Armitage
ShortDescription: SB 94 California buses are temp. rerouted via California, Armitage, Western, North Avenue and California: due to, street blockage near California/Armitage.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #94 California buses are temporarily rerouted via California, Armitage, Western, North Avenue and California: due to, street blockage near California/Armitage.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
